subject: [Mhln] download Adobe Creative Suite 3 Design
body: —The place the road ends, that patch of white paintPealing, it tries to fill the cold night airIn dense bare branches, or the ubiquitousSeized from creation by nonentity,People might see to be the openingA salamander scuttles across the quietBrush the lone giant in that somber pall.Snow haze gleams like sand.By bloody pool—rattling, gasping his last.This drizzling three-day January thaw,My keyhole blows a galeLike some poor wounded wretch—long left for dead"Be off!" say Winter's snows;For any part of them we can make outSphinx of questioning substance, or a sortAnd half-starved foxes shake and pawThis third day of our January thaw,Between the high and the low, in this night.I seek, above all, in the wandering
